description:
Debug Network Faster & Smarter with Proxyman

Proxyman is a high-performance Windows app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP/HTTPS requests/responses with ease.
‚ú® Features
- Introduce the Custom Filter: Filter quickly by creating your own filters. access via filter menu.
- Add option to Sort JSON Keys in Body Previewer: easier to read the JSON body.
- Add GraphQL Filter in the main filter

‚ö°Ô∏è Improve
- Proxyman now use https://proxyman.com for the update server.
- Able to export HAR and CSV with multiple folder
- Use TelemetryDesk for App Analytic

üêû Bugs
- Fixed: Proxyman improperly changing URL in Map Remote
- Fixed: Two open scripts will overwrite eachother after any edit/save
- Fixed: Proxyman incorrectly get the IP from VPN or vEthernet instead of WiFi or Ethernet
- Fixed: Can't activate License key with corperated proxy with Proxy Setting in Settings
